description:
Manages an Amazon Managed Streaming for Kafka configuration. More information can be found on the [MSK Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/msk/latest/developerguide/msk-configuration.html).

~> **NOTE:** The API does not support deleting MSK configurations. Removing this Terraform resource will only remove the Terraform state for it.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

KafkaVersions.description: List of Apache Kafka versions which can use this configuration.

ServerProperties.description: Contents of the server.properties file. Supported properties are documented in the [MSK Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/msk/latest/developerguide/msk-configuration-properties.html).
